org.latency4j.configuration

Class AlertHandlerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.latency4j.configuration.AlertHandlerConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AlertHandlerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    A bean which holds configuration information for an alert handler. Instances of this class are used by the ConfigurationReader as templates for creating alert handler instances.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      AlertHandlerConfiguration()
      Default constructor.

      java.lang.String getAlertHandlerId()
      Returns the value that would be obtained by invoking AlertHandler.getAlertHandlerId() on an alert handler created from this template.

      Accessor to the configured handler parameters.

      Sets the identifier for any alert handler created from this template.

      Sets the type/implementation of alert handler to create.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlertHandlerId

        public java.lang.String getAlertHandlerId()

        Returns the value that would be obtained by invoking AlertHandler.getAlertHandlerId() on an alert handler created from this template.

        Returns:
        The identifier for the handler being configured.
        See Also:
        getAlertHandlerId()

      • setAlertHandlerId

        public void setAlertHandlerId(java.lang.String id)

        Sets the identifier for any alert handler created from this template.

        Parameters:
        id - The identifier to assign to the configured handler.
        See Also:
        getAlertHandlerId()

      • getClassName

        public java.lang.String getClassName()
        Returns the alert handler class name. Put differently, this method is called to obtain the name of the class which implements the AlertHandler interface. It is an instance of the returned class that is created by the ConfigurationReader, and initialised with the values from the bean against which this method is invoked.
        Returns:
        The type of the alert handler that will be created from this template. setClassName(String)

      • setClassName

        public void setClassName(java.lang.String className)
        Sets the type/implementation of alert handler to create.
        Parameters:
        className - The type of the handler.
        See Also:
        getClassName()

      • getParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Accessor to the configured handler parameters. These are the values with which the method AlertHandler.setParameters(Map) is invoked prior to the initialisation of the handler.
        Returns:
        The handler configuration parameters.
        See Also:
        setParameters(Map)

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> handlerParameters)
        Used to specify handler parameters. Put differently, it sets the parameters with which the configured handler will be initialised.
        Parameters:
        handlerParameters - The parameters for the configured handler.
        See Also:
        getParameters()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of this configuration.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of the listener configuration.
